summary: Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan is sent to the U.K. to escort organized crime boss Ben Larkin back to the U.S., but Larkin's hitmen prepare an ambush for Brannigan.
cast: John Wayne|Richard Attenborough|Judy Geeson|Mel Ferrer|John Vernon|Daniel Pilon|John Stride|James Booth|Arthur Batanides|Ralph Meeker|Barry Dennen|Lesley-Anne Down|Pauline Delaney|Del Henney|Brian Glover|Stewart Bevan|Janette Legge|Anthony Booth|Tony Robinson|Don Henderson|Kathryn Leigh Scott|Enid Jaynes|David de Keyser|Lewis Alexander|Del Baker|Tim Barlow|Ernest Blyth|Mark Burns|John Cannon|Derek Chafer|Alan Chuntz|Michael Crane|Hugh Elton|Steve Emerson|Harry Fielder|Victor Harrington|Alf Joint|Steve Kelly|Juba Kennerley|Roy Lansford|George Leech|Rick Lester|Raymond Mason|Declan Mulholland|Michael Munn|Charles Pemberton|Edward Perry|Peter Porteous|Nosher Powell|Charles Price|Mike Reynell|Joe Ritchie|Jeff Silk|Byron Sotiris|Guy Standeven|Philip Stewart|Cy Town|Joe Wadham
title: Brannigan
